A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The film has so many problems\, other audience members have already pointed out all the flaws of this film\, can't believe people can say this film is better than even 2\, 2 at least has a plot that doesn't pull terrible twists at every corner because it is \"bold\"\, putting a grenade inside your mouth is bold too\, just cause something is bold doesn't mean it is smart.
